name: 2023 7th International Conference on Big Data and Internet of Things
content: Publication: Accepted papers after registration will be published in the International Conference Proceedings Series by ACM, which will be archived in the ACM Digital Library, and be indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science). Collaborated Special ISSUES: Accepted and registered papers of BDIOT 2023 are possible to be recommended to: 1\. Special issue of Medical e-Diagnosis by Fusing Deep Learning and Big Data Analytics with the AIMS Press Mathematical Biosciences and Engineering (ISSN 1551-0018) - (Impact factor 2.194, CiteScore: 3.0). Indexed by Scopus, SCIE (Web of Science), Mathematical Reviews, Ei Compendex, Inspec, and many other databases. 2\. Special issue of Advances in E-health Networking and Its Applications with the MDPI Sensors (ISSN 1424-8220). Journal Rank: JCR - Q2 (Instruments & Instrumentation ) / CiteScore - Q1 (Instrumentation ) Indexed by Scopus, SCIE (Web of Science), PubMed, MEDLINE, PMC, Embase, Ei Compendex, Inspec, Astrophysics Data System, and other databases.
